question: How was your weekend?
scenarios: Answer as if you are a very social person, having lots of meetings and one of your friends invited you to a concert.
If you are very busy, having multiple exams next day, one of the lessons you like but there is also a homework from a course that you hate.
Assume that you are an artist and describe your weekend from a creative perspective.
Write as if you are a detective solving a mystery during the weekend.
Imagine you are a traveler who visited a new place over the weekend.
